title: The Internet Of Things Is A Fragmented $19 Trillion Roulette Gamble
text:
Published By: Forbes.com: Latest News - Today 
50 billion connected devices. $19 trillion opportunity. All by 2020. Forget the numbers you see quoted on every slide deck at a conference ...
